topic: How to property test stream processing using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Property Testing Stream Processing in FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer demonstrates how to perform property-based testing on stream processing functions integrated with FastAPI in Python 3.12+ using pytest and Hypothesis libraries.
key_points: Defining custom types for handling streams
Creating a fixture to generate streams
Writing property tests for stream processing functions
Integrating tested functions into FastAPI routes

caveats: Ensure FastAPI dependencies and required libraries are installed
Custom types for handling streams may require adjustments depending on the specific use case
Proper test coverage should include multiple scenarios, edge cases, and various input combinations
